articles.author: Andrew Jones
articles.title: Chinese astronauts install debris shields on Tiangong space station during 8.5-hour spacewalk (video) - Yahoo! Voices
articles.description: Two Chinese astronauts completed an 8.5-hour spacewalk on Jan. 20, a sojourn that installed debris shielding outside the Tiangong space station.
